name: Bishop Autoturret
help:
Deploys an area of effect battle turret which will deliver auto-attacks to enemies within range with a potency of 60 for the first enemy, 10% less for the second, 20% less for the third, 30% less for the fourth, 40% less for the fifth, and 50% less for all remaining enemies. Hypercharge Potency: 90
Hypercharge Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 5%
Duration: 10s Shares a recast timer with Rook Autoturret.
